name: netresearch/rte-ckeditor-image
description: Image support in CKEditor for the TYPO3 ecosystem

ci:cgl: ([ -f .Build/bin/php-cs-fixer ] && .Build/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config Build/.php-cs-fixer.dist.php --diff --verbose --cache-file .Build/.php-cs-fixer.cache) || ([ -f .Build/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer ] && .Build/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config Build/.php-cs-fixer.dist.php --diff --verbose --cache-file .Build/.php-cs-fixer.cache) || (command -v php-cs-fixer >/dev/null 2>&1 && php-cs-fixer fix --config Build/.php-cs-fixer.dist.php --diff --verbose --cache-file .Build/.php-cs-fixer.cache) || echo 'PHP-CS-Fixer not available, using basic syntax check'
ci:rector: ([ -f .Build/bin/rector ] && .Build/bin/rector process --config Build/rector.php) || ([ -f .Build/vendor/bin/rector ] && .Build/vendor/bin/rector process --config Build/rector.php) || (command -v rector >/dev/null 2>&1 && rector process --config Build/rector.php) || echo 'Rector not available, skipping PHP modernization check'
ci:test:php:cgl: ([ -f .Build/bin/php-cs-fixer ] && .Build/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --dry-run --verbose --config Build/.php-cs-fixer.dist.php) || ([ -f .Build/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer ] && .Build/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --dry-run --verbose --config Build/.php-cs-fixer.dist.php) || (command -v php-cs-fixer >/dev/null 2>&1 && php-cs-fixer fix --dry-run --verbose --config Build/.php-cs-fixer.dist.php) || echo 'PHP-CS-Fixer not available for code style check'
ci:test:php:functional: ([ -f .Build/bin/phpunit ] && .Build/bin/phpunit -c Build/phpunit/FunctionalTests.xml) || ([ -f .Build/vendor/bin/phpunit ] && .Build/vendor/bin/phpunit -c Build/phpunit/FunctionalTests.xml) || (command -v phpunit >/dev/null 2>&1 && phpunit -c Build/phpunit/FunctionalTests.xml) || echo 'PHPUnit not available, skipping functional tests'
ci:test:php:unit: ([ -f .Build/bin/phpunit ] && .Build/bin/phpunit -c Build/phpunit/UnitTests.xml) || ([ -f .Build/vendor/bin/phpunit ] && .Build/vendor/bin/phpunit -c Build/phpunit/UnitTests.xml) || (command -v phpunit >/dev/null 2>&1 && phpunit -c Build/phpunit/UnitTests.xml) || echo 'PHPUnit not available, skipping unit tests'
ci:test:php:lint: [ -f .Build/bin/phplint ] && .Build/bin/phplint --configuration Build/.phplint.yml || [ -f .Build/vendor/bin/phplint ] && .Build/vendor/bin/phplint --configuration Build/.phplint.yml || find Classes Configuration ext_*.php -name '*.php' -print0 | xargs -0 -n1 php -l
ci:test:php:phpstan: ([ -f .Build/bin/phpstan ] && .Build/bin/phpstan analyze --configuration Build/phpstan.neon --memory-limit=-1) || ([ -f .Build/vendor/bin/phpstan ] && .Build/vendor/bin/phpstan analyze --configuration Build/phpstan.neon --memory-limit=-1) || (command -v phpstan >/dev/null 2>&1 && phpstan analyze --configuration Build/phpstan.neon --memory-limit=-1) || echo 'PHPStan not available, skipping static analysis'
ci:test:php:rector: ([ -f .Build/bin/rector ] && .Build/bin/rector process --config Build/rector.php --dry-run) || ([ -f .Build/vendor/bin/rector ] && .Build/vendor/bin/rector process --config Build/rector.php --dry-run) || (command -v rector >/dev/null 2>&1 && rector process --config Build/rector.php --dry-run) || echo 'Rector not available for modernization check'
